feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:32 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
